name: Coloring²
description:
Bring out your inner artist and your inner child the relaxing way! Choose from our artist created gallery of beautiful and fun images to color.

Easy as 1, 2, 3!

This app contains auto-renewable subscriptions:
• Premium membership provides access to the ENTIRE gallery of pixel artwork
• 1 week, 1 month, and 1 year durations available​

Limit one free trial per user. Charged through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that product, where applicable.
• Privacy policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/905866
• Terms of use: http://www.timosstudios.com/terms-of-use

You can follow the instructions on our website to change or cancel your subscription:
http://www.timosstudios.com/how-to-cancel-subscription-on-ios
